alert.note: Alert for Coastal Palm Beach County; Inland Palm Beach County; Metro Palm Beach County (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 09 at 6:12PM EDT by NWS Miami
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Palm Beach County through 700 PM EDT... At 611 PM EDT, National Weather Service meteorologists were tracking a strong thunderstorm over The Acreage, or near Palm Beach Gardens, moving southeast at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... West Palm Beach, Wellington, Jupiter, Palm Beach Gardens, Riviera Beach, Palm Beach, Greenacres, Royal Palm Beach, North Palm Beach, Lake Park, Haverhill, Port Of Palm Beach, Golden Lakes, North County Airport, Loxahatchee Groves, Schall Circle, Royal Palm Estates, Lake Belvedere Estates, The Acreage and Mangonia Park. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: These winds can down small tree limbs and branches, and blow around unsecured small objects. Seek shelter in a safe building until the storm passes. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Coastal Palm Beach County; Inland Palm Beach County; Metro Palm Beach County
